Review.Titre: Didn’t tell me order was cancelled…
Review.Contenu: Didn’t tell me order was cancelled until 10 days later and the only way I found out was because the charge dropped off my credit card. Don’t say you have something , take payment, then not have it in the first place and not even notify the customer of the cancelation.

Review.Titre: Got overcharged because the online system is screwy
Review.Contenu: Placed my order on the website and got overcharged due to what appears to be a backend programming issue in their online system. I selected a $130 delivery+installation service and during checkout it added and then later removed an additional $75 delivery fee. My final receipt didn't reflect this fee so I thought it was all good and sorted, but my credit card did. I was overcharged by $75. This made sense because when the delivery day arrived, the delivery crew's work order showed delivery -only- which caused them to refuse to install the washer and dryer I ordered until during delivery, their app updated and showed a separate work order for delivery+installation, like I paid for. I am still trying to get this matter resolved. I called EE customer support and they said their side only showed what was on my receipt, so I'd need to contact Synchrony and have them resolve the matter which I did, and they told me it will take upwards of 65 business days. Unreal.

Review.Titre: Supervisor, Rebecca, & Shipping are subpar!
Review.Contenu: The shipping company you used is horrible.  Eleven days and it did not arrive.  Alex, from Electronic Express, had the shipment returned.  I called regarding a refund and your horrible Supervisor, Rebecca, has the most condescending tone.  After her speaking to me like I was a child, I unleashed.  I will never do business with your company again.  I will also take this to social media.

Review.Titre: Recieved Broken TV, No Replacement Offered
Review.Contenu: Bought a Samsung Frame TV on a Black Friday deal, roughly $500 off of normal retail. When I received the TV it was broken with visible damage to the screen and the unit flashed light without ever turning on. When we asked for a replacement Electronic Express stated that we would need to return the unit in all of it's original packaging to process a refund (the TV at this point is on the wall with the box and packaging in the garage and the garbage), then purchase a new TV from them at the current (non Black Friday) price. The customer service rep was rude as well. Thanks for costing me $500. Ill never purchase from a 2nd tier electronics retailer again.

Review.Titre: I bought in stock keyboard stand
Review.Contenu: I bought one in stock keyboard stand.  Later received cancellation email referring out of stock. Have been waiting for refund.

Review.Titre: Purchased a TV and there was no update…
Review.Contenu: Purchased a TV and there was no update for some days until I emailed them. Now, they confirmed it was shipped but no expected date of arrival. Quite disappointing

Review.Titre: Ordered a MSI Codex Gaming Desktop
Review.Contenu: Ordered a MSI Codex Gaming Desktop - i5 13400F, was sent a MSI Codex Gaming Desktop - i5 12400F?They told me that they don't sell that computer and that the manufacture must have sent the wrong one.Then they tell me that I can return it...I use it for work, and it took them a week to ship it from Nashville, I told the that I can't go 2-3 weeks without a computer with the back and forth.Just be careful dealing with this company, their reply to me was well, we tried to help you? How about they send me another computer and I'll send this back when I get the right one???

Review.Titre: I went to buy a new refrigerator with…
Review.Contenu: I went to buy a new refrigerator with my father. I had just got out of prison a few months earlier and needed to establish credit so I had my father cosign, but the fact that I had had a criminal record. I was unable to get financed even with my father‘s excellent credit, they turned me down on account of my felony, I wished I could sue that finance company. Thanks for a second chance America. never to return to your store again.

Review.Titre: Scam Company
Review.Contenu: I placed an order which was supposed to be delivered on a Saturday, there was an attempted delivery on Friday and they refused to deliver on the weekend. Electronic Express made restrictions on the shipment so the package could not be picked up, and I had to be there for the delivery. The problem is I work a normal 9-5 job and I can't take off of work for a sound bar delivery. Okay, no big deal, let's just cancel the order and refund me... except they will charge me $40 for cancelling my order. This same exact problem is happening with the TV I ordered from this company except with $300 instead of $40 and I wholeheartedly suggest you look at any other company to buy your electronics. This company is full of scam artists and the assistant manager I spoke with had an attitude from the minute she took over the call.

Review.Titre: Don’t mess up your address, you’ll get scammed
Review.Contenu: Don’t mess up your address. Forgot to put my apartment number and once the order is placed you can’t edit your address. Got to my apartment complex and they returned it for not having the apartment number. Shipping was 100$ so now I’m out a tv and 100$. Complete waste of time and money. Will never be using this scam again.

Review.Titre: I received the wrong item
Review.Contenu: I received the wrong item, Hannah emailed me strict rules to return which I took to fed ex and the shipping is over $100 which she is refusing to print out the shipping label for. Will be reporting this and hopefully someone comes to their senses and emails me the return label. I have never seen a company refuse this in 20+ years.

Review.Titre: Worst service ever
Review.Contenu: Worst service ever. Paid for a Washer Dryer set in September. Pilot delivered the washer but lost the dryer. A week later they found a dryer. Delivered it on a broken pallet and when I opened the box 📦 the dryer was damaged on the side. Spoke with Rebecca in customer service which they returned the money for the washer and dryer. I called them and said hey, you gave me a credit for a washer that I still have. So they rebilled my card. So i asked about getting a new dryer to complete the set. I've called them several times and have just refused to take care of the issue. I spoken with the Sales manager JD who said he was working on it 3 weeks ago. I asked them to have a district manager speak with me and they never returned my call...

Review.Titre: Never got the shipment.
Ordered a $99 item and shipping was…
Review.Contenu: Ordered a $99 item and shipping was $99. I chatted with customer service and asked why shipping was so much and they said it was what it actually costs them to ship the item. When I received the item, it was a super light, super flat box that was barely taped together. It could not have cost more than $20 to ship.

Review.Titre: Customer service was totally lacking
Review.Contenu: Customer service was totally lacking.  My order had the wrong shipping address and I was told that the order label had already been printed and it had shipped, even though UPS a had not yet scanned it into their system.  As a result, there was nothing that they could do.  When I asked about reordering when I didn’t receive my TV they were able to cancel my order and have it returned.  They did not inform me of the cancellation.  I found out when PayPal notified me my shipment “might be delayed”.  I have had good customer service in the stores in the past, but the online service, or lack there of is why I’ve shopped my last at Electronic Express.  I bought the same TV at Best Buy and it works great!

Review.Titre: Poor customer service
Review.Contenu: All was well until the delivery time. Waited two entire days at home waiting while being told the delivery is on the way. Store blamed it on a third party delivery service but was it was the store that recommended that service. Calls to store or delivery service were  not returned. A complete waste of our time. We finally cancelled the order and got our money back.

Review.Titre: Item delivered to a different address…
Review.Contenu: Item delivered to a different address that is not mine and I’m not getting my product or credit to my credit card.

Review.Titre: Terrible Service I ordered a refrigerator online on a…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a refrigerator online on a Thursday. Earliest deliver was scheduled for Monday window of 3-6 pm. By 8 pm no one had shown up OR called!  I called Tuesday morning and got a service rep who said I’ll call you back before noon. No call ever came. That afternoon I called and got a different service rep and demanded a refund. I’m still waiting for it to go back onto my charge card. I may have to dispute it with my credit card company to get my refund.

Review.Titre: I didn't get my TV
Review.Contenu: I didn't get my TV. The shipping status is not updated.

Review.Titre: Dryer arrived damaged (or was sold & shipped damaged, hard to judge)
Review.Contenu: Electronic Express asked for a phone number so their shipper could call ahead and schedule delivery.  There was no call and the shipper dropped in in our driveway while we were out of town for the weekend. More problematic, the dryer arrived on a pallet, unprotected and severely damaged. It was clear something heavy got stacked on it during shipment as it was not protected or labeled against stacking in transit. The retailer has been stubborn in response to the damage and we are stuck with an unusable appliance, in spite of our emailing a photo of the damaged shipment the day we arrived home to find it in our driveway. In hindsight it was unwise to purchase an appliance from out of state, but this specific model wasn’t available locally.  Steer clear: the deal was simply too good to be true, and they don’t stand by their (unreliable) shipping methods.

Review.Titre: Purchased a new 65” LG TV and LG sound…
Review.Contenu: Purchased a new 65” LG TV and LG sound bar.   It was to be installed on wall with sound bar attached below tv with bracket mounted to tv.  Electronic express does not carry a bracket to do this.  I spent 2 hours with store staff trying to figure out a solution to no avail.  Received my $2,800 back before leaving store.   We to Best Buy and bought same equipment with the bracket to hold sound bar.  It took 32 minutes.  Frustrated to say the least.

Review.Titre: Received a used, broken toy.
Review.Contenu: I received a toy that had been previously used. The box was torn, the screw to the battery compartment was stripped and the electronic components of toy did not function.

Review.Titre: i don't trust this company they took my…
Review.Contenu: i don't trust this company they took my money and the UPS company had a field day with package then i heard package was requested return by me still having gotten my money back. i do not recommend using to get electronics they will rip you off.

Review.Titre: Order was canceled and was never…
Review.Contenu: Order was canceled and was never notified.

Review.Titre: Currently having an issue with pc where…
Review.Contenu: Currently having an issue with pc where it stop codes. I would not expect this for the price tag… I should have no issue’s if the pc was quality and stress tested before shipment! It has all the parts to be able to run every title out without flaw but seems to crash constantly!

Review.Titre: Dishonest
Review.Contenu: I called about a MacBook and the employee told me he would sell me the display for a discounted price. When the man assisting me in store checked out the computer, I asked if the laptop was at the discounted price. He reassured me that it was. I leave and look at the receipt and he did not give me the price promised. I immediately walked back in and the man working the register gave me the money back I was overcharged. The manager put in his code without an apology or even looking me in the eye, which makes me believe they wanted to get away with it.

Review.Titre: Appliance Installers do not follow Installation Instructions
Review.Contenu: Sales experience was good although installation was extremely poor resulting in not only shattered wall oven door but also damaged kitchen cabinet door. Installation team failed to follow basic installation instructions found in manual: (1) did not remove both wall oven doors to reduce weight and (2) did not install spacer feet resulting in improper fit. One of the installers told my wife we needed a trim piece to correct poor fit caused by spacer feet not installed consistent with installation instructions. We are still searching for a solution to resolve our damaged cabinet door as stain color match is a challenge. Very disappointing experience!

Review.Titre: Over seas shipment orders
Review.Contenu: For starters. You can start by  allowing shipment to territories of the US and not only the continental USA. My order was sent to PA, and then for them to ship the package to Puerto Rico for which I had to pay double  shipment altogether, (your shipment to PA plus the shipment  to PR.) That's why I gave you 1 star.

Review.Titre: BAD experience with instal of dishwasher
Review.Contenu: The 2 guys who delivered were definitely inexperienced.  They had no idea how to turn off power or instal new dish washer.  I asked them to leave without completing the instal.  "we have never installed a dishwasher when there is not a garbage disposal".Completely unacceptable to pay for installation and have someone this inexperienced to show up. They refused to unhook the old machine and haul if off.

Review.Titre: The Truck broke down in Alabama.
Review.Contenu: Truck broke down and I have not receive my appliances as of yet.  I did wait for 2 hours after the initial window period of several hours which was a waste of an entire day.  I received nothing but a sorry and then a rescheduling at 7AM.  Oh yeah did I mention that I am an hour away.  Now I know better and told them to give me an hour notice....I guess they will have to wait if that don't follow give me notice.  Also, I am writing this before I have received my appliances and that's why they have the worst rating.  I guess the auto-robot that sends out the review didn't get the message either.

Review.Titre: ZERO communication skills from this…
Review.Contenu: ZERO communication skills from this company. I still haven’t received my TV and have asked 4 separate times of when it will arrive. I get the same “we’re checking and will get back with you” response. It said the TV would arrive Tuesday. It is now Wednesday and now says I confirmed Friday as the delivery date. I work on Friday and never made an appointment and brought this to the company’s attention Monday morning. Still no reply even though I’ve messaged multiple times after. This is the most unprofessional transaction I’ve had and I will never order another item from this place. I spent way too much money to be ignored.

Review.Titre: Electronics Express sells garbage
Review.Contenu: They sent me an obviously defective item. When I inquired about returning it, Electronics Express sent me a form letter full of contradictory requirements that make it very difficult to return.

Review.Titre: Miserable experience with no customer support
Review.Contenu: Ordered in-store. Item wasn't ready when promised so I tried to cancel over the phone. Store manager insisted an in-store visit was a requirement to cancelling an order and told me "oh, that's tough" when I explained it was almost a two hour round trip. Called my credit card company to dispute the charge and failed to do that until I exhaust all options with Electronics Express. Almost five months later, multiple cold drops to voicemail, not a single employee with an answer available, and still have a $500+ charge I can't get anyone to drop. I recommend shopping with literally ANY store other than Electronics Express.

Review.Titre: False  advertising
Review.Contenu: The product detatils of bone induction headphones listed the output frequency as 20hz/20000hz! The product box details was 150hz/20000 hz. Meaning the BASS frequency from 20 to 150hz did not exist.  Falsely advertised. Return shipping was not included! William Jackson Eads

Review.Titre: Customer service was horrible
Review.Contenu: Customer service was horrible. They were rude. The items I purchase. Didn’t work. They wouldn’t let me return them and exchanged them. I will never use this company again. Worst customer service ever.

Review.Titre: Find out issues before that Lil warranty expires!
Review.Contenu: Your business is good with ordering, delivery etc. Unfortunately I got the “lemon”, and currently have to pay a monthly subscription to HP to constantly jump on board to “fix” the issue. Of course I had all the issues begin after the warranty. So you guys told me, too bad. I literally had to purchase a brand new system just to continue running my business.

Review.Titre: Highly disappointed
Review.Contenu: Honestly, I'm getting a refund. I waited for the 1st delivery from 5 till almost 9:30pm. The stove was installed in the house. The refrigerator was damaged per installer. I went into the Oakridge store because they up a delivery and said someone would call. I finally called and was rescheduled for the 1st. Guys was pulling off when I got there. I wanted a call because no one is living there.

Review.Titre: Every appliance I had malfunctioned
Review.Contenu: Every appliance I had malfunctioned. I attempted to contact the local store and corporate numerous times over the coarse of 6 months ,only to get No assistance. I spoke with the corporate assistant who always would say she would return my call and never did .The warranty on appliances was no help … they would send technicians to the home and they would leave without doing anything only to reschedule another appointment 8 weeks out…we eventually paid ourselves to have them serviced privately. Poor service at its finest. Nothing short of a nightmare, I will never shop there again.

Review.Titre: Cancelled Order with zero explanation
Review.Contenu: Called ahead of time to make sure that item I wanted to purchase was being sold properly at the price on website. Was assured this was the correct price. Made the purchase. Two days later my Paypal was refunded the money. No email, no explanation, no nothing. So insanely unprofessional. Really at a loss for words over how this was handled. I'm assuming they chose not to sell it at this price, but I'm not sure as I've receied nothing

Review.Titre: Very poor Customer Service
Review.Contenu: Very poor Customer Service!  Delivery department worst l have ever dealt with, told we could setup delivery time but they refused to work with us.  Then made no attempt to right the wrong.  Will NOT use this business again!!!

Review.Titre: Insurance program sucks
Review.Contenu: I turned my laptop in at the Jones Valley location approximately 3 months ago to be looked at under warranty purchased. I have yet to hear back from anyone regarding status, even after calling the store 4 times now.

Review.Titre: We’ve complained about our experience…
Review.Contenu: We’ve complained about our experience more than once and customer service argues with us. I’m not going to go over all of it again but nothing was done. And no one tried to make anything right. We do not recommend this store.

Review.Titre: I waited so long for the Samsung…
Review.Contenu: I waited so long for the Samsung refrigerator panels that I couldn’t wait anymore so I bit the bullet and took what they had stocked. … I hate the colors that I received. So I emailed corporate and told them about my experience. Months have passed and I haven’t heard a thing from them. Too bad because I had a pretty good experience other than having to wait for panels that never came in. I don’t see how you expect someone to wait so long with an incomplete fridge in a brand new home. You should have a better policy set up from the beginning to let the customer know when they order something and it takes almost a year to receive the full product. I will be purchasing new panels and it won’t be from electronic express!

Review.Titre: First they broke my cabinet installing
Review.Contenu: First they broke my cabinet installing, second the oven hasn't worked since day 1.  I tried submitting a ticket to  GE and they want me to pay to fix it.  WOW just amazing.  The dishwasher was delivered but they couldn't install it because they didn't know how so we had to send it back.

Review.Titre: Shipped Damaged!!!
Review.Contenu: I purchased a set of Cuisinart Elite flatware as a gift for someone and was shipped a ripped box of flatware not suitable to give as a gift. When I contacted customer NO service, I was told that I would have to pay for shipping to return it!!! The manager was suppose to look in to it but apparently did not!

Review.Titre: What went wrong???Placed and used…
Review.Contenu: What went wrong???Placed and used credit card for order #EE`62185.9/25 Received email item backed ordered. 9/30 followed up on order.10/2 received email order was shipped 9/23 and by the way it's lost and it's going to take 7-14 business days to find out what happened to my order.  Is this some sort of scam you're running??????

Review.Titre: Terrible delivery department
Review.Contenu: Purchase a washer and dryer set with shipping and installation on July 28. I was not present the day of the installation (August 4) and my 13-year-old son received the technicians. The technicians did not verify the work and the dryer did not work. I contacted the delivery department and they had to come on Tuesday, August 7 to change the dryer. They called me to tell me that they couldn't go and they changed the date to Friday, August 11. They also did not arrive on Friday August 11th and I canceled the purchase, They came to pick up the washer and dryer on August 18th.Terrible service, they do not meet delivery deadlines and delay in scheduling visits due to having many orders.If you don't have staff to serve customers, hire more technicians.

Review.Titre: The dishwasher I bought at the outlet…
Review.Contenu: The dishwasher I bought at the outlet store in Murfreesboro was sold to another customer! I purchased the dishwasher from John the general manager 4 weeks prior but he failed to label it as sold. This was very upsetting to me. He did refund me the money.

Review.Titre: Shady company that takes your money.
Review.Contenu: On June 4th, I bought a gaming laptop and they waited till the day after I spent $619 to tell me that the item wasn’t in stock and that it was coming to their warehouse “next week”. At least they gave me the option to get a refund but the company is so sketchy and based on the reviews I don’t even know if I WILL get my money back. I don’t recommend buying anything from this company.

Review.Titre: Two guys came took water dispenser…
Review.Contenu: Two guys came took water dispenser apart said it needs a light bulb but didn’t have one said you guys would send someone with a light bulb haven’t heard a word yet?

Review.Titre: Apparently the truck broke down and the…
Review.Contenu: Apparently the truck broke down and the product could not be delivered at the designated time. The product was delivered at 9:30 pm. Not acceptable. Too late . Should have rescheduled. Would not recommend

Review.Titre: Not Honest
Review.Contenu: I ordered a dryer that said 1 in stock. The company called me and said “they just shipped the dryer, it just left their warehouse and would be to a freight terminal in our town in 6 to 10 days” the next day they emailed to say that the dryer is out of stock, but “they have several already on order and they will be to their warehouse in 4 to 6 weeks”. Strange since they told me they already shipped the one I ordered to us. Then I get an email that says the dryer is no longer manufactured and they can’t order anymore so they are canceling my order, also strange considering they said they had already ordered several and they would be in stock and 4 to 6 weeks. I already knew the dryer in my color was no longer manufactured, but some stores still had some in stock. I was looking for my exact color to match my washer, and because they are no longer manufacturing that color the ones that are left are really really expensive. It bothers me that a company said that it had already shipped something and even called me to tell me, but that was a lie and then it said that it had already ordered more to be coming in stock, when in fact, that was a complete lie too. In the meantime, I have to wait for them to reimburse our money before we can buy another dryer…Still waiting btw. Honesty is the most important thing to me. If your company cannot be honest with me, they cannot get my service now or in the future I would have been fine being told the dryer was out of stock and they were going to try and order more and then find out they weren’t able to, but instead I got lied to.

Review.Titre: if you order online make sure and let…
Review.Contenu: if you order online make sure and let them install the appliance. they will not back up the product they are selling if you don't. I will NEVER buy anything from them again and would protest outside their store if I had time. as to your reply, only one way to wire it in without reverse polarity..... I'm not a moron..also you are right here in Chattanooga Tennessee not several states away

Review.Titre: The packaging was poor they threw all…
Review.Contenu: The packaging was poor they threw all my transformers together instead of wrapping them individually to avoid damaging the boxes if you are collecting think twice about ordering multiple items at once some will be damaged for sure. Individually you may have better luck

Review.Titre: SHIPPED DAMAGED MERCHANDISE
Review.Contenu: I purchased a set of Cuisinart Elite flatware as a gift for someone and was shipped a ripped box of flatware not suitable to give as a gift. When I contacted customer NO service, I was told that I would have to pay for shipping to return it!!!

Review.Titre: Used product shipped as a new product
Review.Contenu: I ordered new Sony WF-SP800N Earbuds. I received a product that was very clearly opened. The charging cable sent was not a USB-C. All of the different sized silicon rubber parts (for different sized ears) were missing. You can even see someone else's skin cells and fingerprints on the earbuds.I received a return authorization listing the product as defective. The product was not defective. Electronic Express shipped a used product with incorrect and missing parts.

Review.Titre: Many Errors I can forgive but too much communication with a requested apology.
Review.Contenu: I did not receive the product and I had to fight to get a refund.  I am assuming the refund was completed at this point. After many errors on 2 orders I finally received an apology after requesting the apology.

Review.Titre: I think it was more about the Sale than…
Review.Contenu: I think it was more about the Sale than customer experience!!I cautioned the salesperson that several times I’ve had bad service and delivery from other range retailers.He assured me that wouldn’t happen, with that we ordered over $5000 worth of appliances.  When it came time 3-4 weeks later for the cooktop and range to arrive, cooktop was only thing received.  When I called about the range, the salesman never returned my call.  Do I drive to Franklin and walked in showroom.  Salesman confessed he didn’t order it!!! Once again, no range. He did admit it was his fault , said it would be another 2-3 weeks.  After : weeks I began calling.  No clear direct answer and Manager didn’t apologize.2 weeks later my range arrived, after I threatened to cancel the order.

Review.Titre: I came in looking for help on a $10…
Review.Contenu: I came in looking for help on a $10 piece of hardware and the First Gentleman tried to upswell me on a $1800 computer, rather than understand the problem. This store is only good for purchasing goods. Not getting help with your products.

Review.Titre: Did not purchase upsell install…
Review.Contenu: Did not purchase upsell install package.  Instead, only purchased the necessary cord for the appliance.  It was clear that they wanted me to purchase the higher priced install and the cord was not included with the order.Edit;To the electronicexpress response, I purchased the dryer cord separately, as I said I did in the original review,and it still wasn't included.

Review.Titre: DON'T BUY APPLIANCE PACKAGE DEALS
Review.Contenu: Purchased a Whirlpool Kitchen appliance package. Did not like the refrigerator. Extremely loud. Returned for refund. Turns out that we could have purchased every item separate for less cost that the "package deal". Charged for an additional delivery fee for picking up the junk refrigerator.

Review.Titre: Fix your order form and policies
Review.Contenu: I gave a PO box address which was accepted. Then I get notice that UPS has it and wont deliver without address change. You refused to change the address with them and product has to be returned by UPS and I have to wait til then for refund and then order again. Nope.Update: just received my refund and its $35.15 less than the original charge. The experience just gets better and better. Further update: After they refused to contact  UPS and requiring UPS to return the item to them they have charged a $35.15 restocking fee and take no responsibility at all for their system accepting an address they cant use and no it does not state no PO boxes on their order form. They refuse to return the $35.15. Bad policies, bad customer service. Never again with this Company. I will be filing proper complaints with the proper agencies. Avoid the hassle.

Review.Titre: Don't be afraid to ask questions
Review.Contenu: Personally I have a lot of experience installing kitchen and appliances. Purchasing a freezer from E E has made me have serious questions as to if they are selling factory seconds or not. The first freezer was delivered with one corner crushed and the packaging rag tag put together.  The second one (replacement) looks pretty good but with a hinge cover missing.

Review.Titre: Terrible Customer Service
Review.Contenu: Terrible Customer Service - We ordered a TV from Electronic Express that arrived weeks late. When it finally got to our house, we opened the box and it was the wrong television - a cheaper version worth hundreds less than we paid. When we asked how they would correct this, they offered no apologies or solutions to the problem. We still don't have the TV we ordered. Save your time and money and go to a more reputable company.

Review.Titre: Order a light saber was told it would…
Review.Contenu: Order a light saber was told it would be delivered to the store to be picked up in like 5 days , still has not been delivered

Review.Titre: Once I told them I was here for a mouse…
Review.Contenu: Once I told them I was here for a mouse pad they had no interest to help (guess they thought I wasn't worth their time). I bought my computer there a year before so it was not like I didn't already spend alot.

Review.Titre: Terrible delivery and customer service…
Review.Contenu: Terrible delivery and customer service for delivery. I was supposed to get my delivery by 6:45pm and it was delivered after 9pm!!! No one has contacted me from the company at all to discuss the issues and I will be taking my business elsewhere

Review.Titre: No accurate UPS Tracking
Review.Contenu: I purchased a $1,800 Samsung two weeks ago, and ever since, they have been sending me UPS Tracking numbers that are no accurate. Cancelled, Label created but never arrived to UPS, etc., and absolutely no answer. I'm really afraid I will loose my money. Worst Customer service I have ever dealt with.

Review.Titre: They do not even deserve one star
Review.Contenu: They do not even deserve one star. They sold an OLD model turntable, have refused to let me return it or give me a refund, told me to contact the brand that made it because they have a 1 year warranty. Turns out it is only a 90 day warranty. I contacted Electronic Express multiple times today and they just keep replying with nope, too bad, have a nice day. Horrible customer service.

Review.Titre: NOT HAPPY!
Review.Contenu: I purchased a microwave that was too big for my counter and asked if I could return it for a smaller and even more expensive one. Since my husband through the box away they wouldn't take it back or exchange it!!!!!! It was the very next day and after promises to get back with me after talking to the manager they still said NO. So I will not buy anything else from you and also my neighbor had intended on buying her new appliances there. Not Now!! That's as Honest as I can be!

Review.Titre: STAY AWAY FROM USING AMAZON PAY
Review.Contenu: 12/28 I was on ElecExp's website, browsing for a potential gift, saw a link for payment method option AMAZON PAY. I've been a Prime member ~ 15 yrs & never heard of AMAZON PAY & simply wanted to see if my Prime benefits applied, if I could I utilize my AMAZON gift card balance, etc., just wanted to learn more. Clicked CONTINUE & immediately recv'd "THANK YOU FOR YOUR SALE" popup message. 4 things failed in this transaction. 1) I never authorized transaction. I called ElecExp cust svc immediately to CANCEL order but was told no (thought this was very odd) due to the order already in process & they APOLOGIZED 2) stated they're aware of their website system “bug” problem & 3) they could still resolve the situation by statusing the order as UPS REQ SIGNATURE delivery, so I could decline signing, refuse delivery & get an auto credit, but I confirmed w/ UPS they didn't flag the order as such, thus UPS simply left at my door. 4) they're refusing to send me a prepaid shipping label and want me to double box the item (didn’t recv that way?) and pay out of my own pocket to ship enormous box & pay restock fees. NOT ETHICAL OR FAIR.

I have to add water to every load both on the wash cycle and the rinse cycle taking up a lot on time checking the machine for the timing of these cycles.  I hate these machines. Also the dryer does not get the clothes dry on the auto setting. I have to use the times dry setting.  SO basically I screwed myself over!
