Review.Titre: I know it’s some crazy times right now
Review.Contenu: I know it’s some crazy times right now, but if a ticket was made on 4-4-20 and a shipment couldn’t be made the least you could do is respond to those whose money you have. At first my delivery was to arrive on 4-14-20 when it didn’t arrive, I didn’t receive any notice and has had no further information as to a possible deliver date.Thank you for being a essential. Stay healthy, stay informed. J Kinchen

Review.Titre: Sorry but item took an extra day to…
Review.Contenu: Sorry but item took an extra day to arrive and I asked 3 questions prior to items arrival and only 1 got answered. I don't believe in Average rating. You either suck or you're good. I will not or would not purchase from Electronic Express again - I chose EE over Amazon because I would prefer to help small business. I would personally return the item purchased if the communication was better, but I will take my loss and move on.

Review.Titre: Used Product Which Is Not Usable
Review.Contenu: I ordered a sewing machine and it was a good price. The shipping was great, too. I looked like it was in perfect condition until we got ready to sew and discovered that it had thread stuck in the bottom of footer and behind the bobbin. I thought at first that it was neat that it came with a full bobbin but now know it was because someone else used it and screwed it up!!! I'm waiting to hear back and it's been two days now.

Review.Titre: The price point was excellent and…
Review.Contenu: The price point was excellent and quality product. However the cost to deliver was well over whatbis should have been by triple and they used FedEx neither place was workable even for a gold when it was sent to an incorrect address by no fault of mine, both Fedex and Electronics Express blamed each other neither helped with the problem

Review.Titre: I ordered TV from…
Review.Contenu: I ordered TV from pricewaiter.com however TV sent from electronic express. I do not mind. But outside package came significantly damaged delivered by FEDEX and left in front of my door. If I would see it i would not accept the package. It was handled so bad. As you know electronics prone  to damage if not handled and delivered properly especially TV's. I turned TV on it was working now but who knows if it will be problems down the road since TV handled very bad. And how long it will last ?

Review.Titre: Item was refurbished but while updating…
Review.Contenu: Item was refurbished but while updating it initially I started getting errors that the battery was nearing the end of its life.  Very pleasant when I called and got me a return authorization and president label.... HOWEVER...since then they have not credited the purchase price back or returned my phone calls.  They received the unusable computer back a week ago.  Up until this transaction I was pleased with EE.

Review.Titre: Quick, but missing part!
Review.Contenu: The package came in super quick and they communicated very well! However, the box was missing a wire that comes with the product and when I called customer service, the lady was super mean and short with me. At this point it has been a week and I still haven’t gotten my replacement part that I was promised, and I am not sure if it is even coming!

Review.Titre: I got my product
Review.Contenu: I got my product, which was a lego set that was just thrown in an envelope and shipped.  So it was basically a flat folder with Legos in it.  I had to keep it because it finally arrived 2 days before Christmas due to the postal system delays.  A little disappointed in your shipping process

Review.Titre: have not received the item
Review.Contenu: order 8/16 now 9/7 still have not received the item. Called FedEx who said it has not received the item. Called Elec Express who said it sent the item. call paypal to cancel but I have to go to elec express so I am in a loop. I no longer need that item but I have to return the item which I do not have

Review.Titre: My not so great experience
Review.Contenu: The man who helped me pick me a washer and dryer as well as the delivery team were wonderful. The manager, however, was extremely rude when talking to me about the washing machine I ordered being out of stock. He sent me the display model and thinks “I should just be happy with it”. He was not happy when I told him I wanted a new one just like I ordered.

Review.Titre: OVER-BEARING
Review.Contenu: I REALLY DON'T LIKE BEING PESTERED WHEN I GO TO SHOP, IF I HAVE QUESTIONS, I'LL ASK. I HAD RATHER SPEND 12 HOURS ON CAR LOT THAN TO COME IN MY LOCAL STORE. ONLY REASON FOR COMING IN WAS FOR MY WIFE TO GET A PORTABLE DVD PLAYER AND THE SALESMAN WOULDN'T LEAVE US ALONE ABOUT AN 84" TV. I ADMIRED IT BUT COULDN'T AFFORD IT. TRAIN EMPLOYEES BETTER THAN THAT. I UNDERSTAND THEY WORK ON COMMISSION BUT YOU END UP RUNNING PEOPLE AWAY...

Review.Titre: quick delivery but not what we ordered
Review.Contenu: We got the iPad we ordered within like a day but the iPad I ordered was was supposed to be WiFi and lte cellular data but when it came it was WiFi only and I tried to take it back to the store but they said to call customer service...we have tried calling multiple times and it just rings with no answer 😩

Review.Titre: Not impressed
Review.Contenu: I found that my product was a previous generation model and $150 overpriced.  This order took 10 days to receive as well.  On my next order, I was not notified of a backorder, and therefore received my package approx. two weeks later.  Received tracking information late on both orders, so did not know when to look out for my delivery.  Also, customer service would sometimes take two or three days to respond to simple inquiries

Review.Titre: Wrong product description
Review.Contenu: I ordered a Bluetooth dongle that, according to the ebay description, included a CD with the necessary software drivers.Before opening the dongle package, I read the Contents list.  No mention of a CD.  I emailed Electronic Express and asked if the CD was inside the package.  Julian Z. replied that he thought it was.I opened the dongle package and no CD.  Julian Z. offered a refund but I declined because it was easier to download the driver.

Review.Titre: I ordered online
Review.Contenu: I ordered online. I had to return the gift and the only way was to mail it in. You have all these stores here in Nashville. One less than 2 miles from home and they won’t take returns, c’mon you guys have been in business along time now and should have better return service than this?

Review.Titre: Took way too long to get our packages…
Review.Contenu: Took way too long to get our packages and after ordering they then tell me that they are out of stock and will ship it once they get it. 2 weeks later and a week before christmas they cancel the order. No notice nothing. Only way I found out was through a refund on my card from them.

Review.Titre: customer service is rude. Both reps that work for them
Review.Contenu: Good prices and shipping but the return and exchange process is not good at all. Also the customer service is rude. They had two reps working and both will give you different information and when you ask questions to clarify somethings they get annoyed and don’t want to answer properly and give you wrong information.

Review.Titre: Wouldn’t honor posted price after checkout
Review.Contenu: The sales associate upsold an internet router to me based on a posted price. After I checked out, I noticed I was charged $30 more. I brought up the discrepancy and went back to the floor and showed him the tag. They wouldn’t honor the price. I should have shopped at Walmart where they don’t punish the customer for their mistakes. Electronic Express emailed me asking how my experience was. I replied and their customer service department never responded.

Review.Titre: Don’t Honor Prices As marked!!
Review.Contenu: Went to store to look for a specific item.  Found the item with a good price so I had the employee pull them out of the shelf.  In small print on the tag I guess that sell had ended a few days earlier but they failed to pull the sale tag.  We walked up to the counter & employee called manager about honoring that ticket price & the manager said no.  Last time I checked that was callled “False Advertising”.....I do not recommend this store

Review.Titre: Although the product was in stock
Review.Contenu: Although the product was in stock, good price and was delivered fairly quickly, I received an item that was clearly used. I placed a call and was initially offered a percentage off, which needed to be approved. I accepted but never heard back until I sent another email a week later and then the offer was rescinded. I was told that I could repackage it and ship it back and go through that hassle....I decided to clean it and keep it and hope that the original reason it was returned doesn't come back to haunt me.....

Review.Titre: Package took mini vacation still haven’t received
Review.Contenu: Probably not sellers fault, but item went was GUARANTEED by Dec. 12.   Today is the 15th and item is in Utah.    Item shipped from Tennessee to Cincinnati Oh and for some reason it has been in Utah for 4 days.     I won’t buy from again and it can be blamed on fed ex or whatever.    I skipped over 20 other orders because this one was the closest.

Review.Titre: The seller sent me an item tootally…
Review.Contenu: The seller sent me an item tootally different than description, he mentioned that laptop is touch however is not.When I contacted the seller he doesn't provide any options to solve the issue like ecxhanging or partially refund and tell me to return which is wasting time and I got to Best buy to get one instead as I needed urgently

Review.Titre: Issues with order and delivery
Review.Contenu: First Had issues with ordering.   Kept causing fraud alerts.  For a 20 dollar charge. It’s probably on the bank end but I do wander if the particular vendor is causing more alerts.  Then the shipment never arrived.  The tracking shows a completely different zip code.   I called to check they said they will investigate and told me they will get back to me in 7-14 days!!! 2 weeks for a 20 dollar purchase.  I should have bought from amazon.  I try to by from different vendors but waste of time.  Would have never happened at Amazon.

Review.Titre: Survey
Review.Contenu: Associate I dealt with was very professional and polite. No complaints there. However, I wasn’t satisfied with the service or situation of getting my stereo replaced. I was told the installer just had a baby. So I would call and check and nothing. I did this for about 3 weeks. Finally decided to do it myself. Much rather pay $130  and have a “professional “ install it. With less time ,than take 8 hours of my time. Anyways I love my radio and customer service is fine. Thanks

Review.Titre: Terrible return policy
Review.Contenu: I would never in my life but from a company with such a stupid return policy. I didn't read the policy before I bought.Your shipping tactic was also lousy. The item I received was damaged, most likely due to your lazy shipping.Don't offer free shipping if you're not willing to wrap it in a way that doesn't damage it!

Review.Titre: Freezer was shipped via fedex
Review.Contenu: Freezer was shipped via fedex. Outside of freezer was damaged on the back and at the bottom front corners. Diid not want the hassle of trying to return freezer. Since it still worked, I decided to keep it. Would not recommend buying anything from electronic express that ships fedex!

Review.Titre: Bad customer service with delivery problem
Review.Contenu: I guess for security reasons, when I went to order this game console to ship to another address my debit card wouldn't go through. It offered me the option to pay through PayPal. I went through but was staged to ship to my house instead. When I called them right away to tell them I needed to change the delivery address they told me too bad, it couldn't be changed. So I wound up paying about $30 to ship it to myself, then spent another $13 to ship it out to where it was supposed to go. Bad customer service!

Review.Titre: New $3000 fridge arrived with a huge…
Review.Contenu: New $3000 fridge arrived with a huge dent in the side. I was told I could wait on a replacement or keep the dented fridge with a 5% discount. I opted for replacement. #2 fridge arrived two days later and it was in worse shape than the first one. More dents were in the fridge, a hole in the left bottom side and the bottom pull out drawer was broken .So, I am now waiting on #3 fridge which I was told may be a month or more before it arrives. I do get to keep #1 fridge for use until #3 gets here.  What a mess!

Review.Titre: Where is my stove?
Review.Contenu: And the paperwork on my stove had the wrong first name and the wrong telephone number. I tried to contact customer service because the delivery time would not work for me and a week later I still have not gotten any response to my email or text. I have no idea where my stove is. By the way it is fully paid for

Review.Titre: No follow up regarding damaged goods upon delivery.
Review.Contenu: Sale process was fine, delivery was quick, but communication after the sale was not available.  Delivery service advises to text for faster service, but offers no reply.  Damage to oven was communicated back to delivery service, but no follow up from EE was received on how/when it would be repaired/replaced.

Review.Titre: When they delivered the 4 appliances on…11/8
Review.Contenu: When they delivered the 4 appliances on Thursday !!/8... there was a dent in the door of the refrigerator. I sent pictures as well as scratches of the hardwood floor. I called Tuesday, 11/13 and left message for Ashley, who I have previously communicated with. As of today 11/15 ....NO RESPONSEBill Boner

Review.Titre: Don't expect for everything to be there.
Review.Contenu: While we received the item we ordered,  it was missing half of its accessories that were advertised, and zero response from multiple messages to customer service.   This caused a unnecessary shopping trip to try to find the missing accessories,  so we could use the item.

Review.Titre: I already told them this Their return…
Review.Contenu: I already told them this Their return policy is a joke to return pkg must be unopened and in "pristine"condition How oin the hell can you do that You have to open to find out why youre un happy In this case because there was no voice mail on units I didnt do enough research on these phones I guess But I assumed all anasonicphones had the same featuires that my old Panasonic phones had I disconnected them and put my old phones back in The new ones are in bottom of my closet till I dind someone who wants the cheap things

Review.Titre: Communication was good initally but…
Review.Contenu: Communication was good initally but when a package was lost by Fedex in shipment (Fedex's representative admitted their driver delivered it to the wrong address and let a stranger sign for it but couldn't get it back later)  EE refused to issue a refund or replacement.  I was surprised things could go so wrong with a package that had signature confirmation.  The problem was really between them and Fedex who was fighting their claim but they passed it on to me when it wasn't my fault. They need to work on how they handle claims.

Review.Titre: Broken item
Review.Contenu: The Samsung TV 55' came broken. No visible dents or creaks were found. But when it was plugged in, the huge crack appeared on the screen.Return and refund and waisting time...Customer service copy-pasting messages.2 stars just because big box with "nothing" was delivered

Review.Titre: Received previously opened item
Review.Contenu: The package of my Xbox Elite series 2 controller was opened before it arrived. The seals have been cut with a blade and the trigger pads were missing. Can't say I'm confident that I got a new controller and not a refurbished, or was sent the display model.

Review.Titre: No Follow Up email with tracking and upon receiving my order there was a part missing.
Review.Contenu: I had to call CS to get a tracking number, when it states on web site that You will be receiving another email with the tracking number.Then when I received my Yeti Tumbler with the magnetic slide on top was missing. I contacted CS when I recieved my Yeti and told the representative about the lid missing the part. The representative checked other locations to see if they had one in stock.No Luck.The representative said I could return it for a full refund or they could give me a $10 credit back to my card.So that is what I did. Not sure if I would order from them again.

Review.Titre: I purchased a countertop ice maker
Review.Contenu: I purchased a countertop ice maker, it didn’t specify that it was used or refurbished on the online ad. (Guessing they must sell both, I would have specified that I wanted a New one if needed) I received my order, the box was very damaged and marked “Returned” on all sides of the box. When I opened the box there was no direction book,owners manual, or receipt information in either of the boxes. I immediately emailed them and the only response provided was that they would approve a refund if I wanted to ship it back to them, but needs to be within 10 days of original purchase???

Review.Titre: Ordered and purchased our new…
Review.Contenu: Ordered and purchased our new applainaces March 4.  Got the delivery set for this Thursday yesterday.   Today get a phone call that the washer and dryer are on back order till May sometime.  The card we used us with me in Wisconsin.   How can this be resolved right now.Ron Hessil

Review.Titre: Had to bring back dryer that was…
Review.Contenu: Had to bring back dryer that was delivered, to the store in Cookeville. It had a big dent in the side.They did give me a new dryer, only to have the timer go bad. it cost me $60.00. I will not be doing any more business with Electronic Express any more. Also will be closing my account.

Review.Titre: Quick delivery, shabby condition
Review.Contenu: My dehumidifier arrived quickly, but the box looks like it was placed in standing water. It was disintegrating at the bottom and had water marks on the bottom half foot. It actually runs, but the condition of the box leaves me hesitant to buy anything here again.

Review.Titre: I brought a freezer from the one in…
Review.Contenu: I brought a freezer from the one in Mufreesboro and was told that they didn't have one in on that Saturday but would have one on the following Wednesday and they would call me. Never heard from them so I called them on that Friday and was told they were out again.

Review.Titre: Faulty charger cord to ordered tablet
Review.Contenu: I ordered & received a tablet & case combination, which looks great!!!  BUT THERE IS S MAJOR PROBLEM....THE CHARGER CORD IS DEFECTIVE!!!  I'VE SENT YOUR COMPANY 2 EMAILS REGUARDING THIS PROBLEM, BUT I HAVEN'T RECEIVED ANY RESPONSE FROM YOUR COMPANY!!!  PLEASE ADVISE ME IN REQUARDS TO THIS MATTER WITHIN THE NEXT 5 BUSINESS DAYS, AS I HAVE A HAVE ALREADY GIVEN YOU THE LAST WEEK TO DO SO!!!  IF YOUR COMPANY WILL SEND A REPLACEMENT CORD I CAN KEEP THE TABLET, IF NOT THEN I WILL NEED TO RETURN IT & RECEIVE A FULL REFUND....THANKS FOR YOUR PROMPT RESPONSE

Review.Titre: Oven works fine, but...
Review.Contenu: Oven works fine. We got it installed and all set up before realizing there was a dent on the top of the unit above the controls. The box had a pretty big damaged area on top but didn't look like it reached the unit. Our fault for not thoroughly inspecting every square inch before bringing it in the house and hooking it up. We paid too way too much money for a factory second. Electronic Express' response is just "sorry, what do you want to do". Not their fault but sending in the photos of the damage we should have been credited as this is a factory second. I have an idea to build a shelf to cover it up but still.

Review.Titre: Great selection of electronic probably…
Review.Contenu: Great selection of electronic probably better than the Best Buy in my area but it was the manager that day helping me to find a pen for my surface pro. He told me that they where doing no taxes that day. When I checked out and got my receipt there was tax charged.

Review.Titre: I called about my order and I was …
Review.Contenu: I called about my order and I was  surprised that the lady I talked to was not polite at all during the inquiry of my order. She didn't seem to give a _______.  I did get the order in and was satisfied with the item. Not sure I'll buy again.

Review.Titre: Ordered a pizza oven
Review.Contenu: Ordered a pizza oven. It came fine, but the bottom of the box was rotted out and cardboard had been placed over it. There was nothing protecting my order. The oven seems to be fine but I was disappointed in the packaging and delivery.

Review.Titre: Delivery issues delivering to our…
Review.Contenu: Delivery issues delivering to our vacant rental property; received a text at 8:10pm one Friday night that they’d be there in 10 mins. They Did not call to get the lockbox code, just left without delivering. Have been on the phone with them multiple times

Review.Titre: When purchasing my computer they were…
Review.Contenu: When purchasing my computer they were extremely friendly and helpful. When I returned hours later with a problem all friendliness was gone and I was met with challenges. “Who sold it to you, What did you do?” I will shop at different store in the future.

Review.Titre: Pros and cons
Review.Contenu: Neg-Prices are available everywhere- no real discounts-No free shipping- Pos-Easy to manage site- items are as represented Fast shipping / delivery

Review.Titre: You told me and my sister will have…
Review.Contenu: You told me and my sister will have 300$ visa gift card back for each person but so far we didn’t receive anything from the day we purchased yet. We feel like you guys tricked us for that

Review.Titre: When it comes to buying a tv make sure…
Review.Contenu: When it comes to buying a tv make sure you do your research, because some of the tv’s features are unwanted and can not be change on a LG OLED MOUSE POINTER IS A PAIN IN THE ASS. So if you don’t like mouse pointers that have a AI ATTACH as a feature then don’t waste $1400 on this tv for gaming. IT will randomly appear every time u move the tv control and drive you nuts because when you click to view its has already jump to a new area/feature on the tv…and it disrupts viewing on apps.

Review.Titre: Good price for the TV but the delivery…
Review.Contenu: Good price for the TV but the delivery process was ridiculous. Instead of using UPS, FedEx, or DHL, they use some other shipping company that took too long and has inconvenient delivery times.

Review.Titre: Not a very good experence
Review.Contenu: I placed 2 orders for weather radios, both addressed to my P. O. Box. One order for 5 radios and one order for 1 radio. I received the order for the 1 radio at my P. O. Box because it was sent USPS. The order for 5 radios was sent UPS which does not deliver to P. O. boxes and was returned. I had to reorder to be sent to my physical address, which USPS doesn't deliver to. Electronic Express ordering system should have caught the shipping problem up front. It took several days for the refund to post to my account after the returned shipment was received even though the charge was posted as soon as I placed the order.

Review.Titre: It takes too long to deliver.
We liked the quick delivery service and…
Review.Contenu: We liked the quick delivery service and the delivery men.  They were fast and they cleaned up after the cutting through the cabinet to install the dishwasher.  They did not tell me how to start the dishwasher.  The company instructions were not detailed enough.  I went on the internet and got more information but not enough explanations.  I would like to know how much time each program takes.

Review.Titre: Good price and product delivered on…
Review.Contenu: Good price and product delivered on time but it came with 100 emails that are still coming.

Review.Titre: Delivery Service from Electronic…
Review.Contenu: Delivery Service from Electronic Express was a hit and miss mess from Day One. There were some good parts and other (not so good) parts. We scheduled delivery of our kitchen package on Saturday, October 7 (stove, refrigerator, microwave and dishwasher).  We knew from the beginning that the microwave was backordered and would not be delivered at that time so that was expected.When the delivery team arrived, they set up the refrigerator with no issues. They then told me that they did indeed have a microwave on the truck so they brought it in and installed it.  They made a mess on my countertops drilling the holes in the cabinet above the stove to install the microwave and did not clean it up.They then brought in the dishwasher – after a few minutes, they called me into the kitchen and said that they could not install the dishwasher because they could not get my old dishwasher out because of the way my tile flooring was laid. I did see them yank on the dishwasher so I believed what they told me was accurate.That team left – I called the store immediately and spoke to William, the store manager who sold me the kitchen package.  I explained what they told me. He assured me that once I had the flooring issue resolved, I could reschedule the install (at no additional charge which was GREAT).While I was waiting on a contractor to come out and resolve the dishwasher issue, 2 issues happened.  First, we noticed a dent in the side of the new microwave that was delivered. I called and spoke to one of the salesmen in the store where I purchased. He referred me to the install department. They were great to offer a new microwave and scheduled a replacement to be delivered on November  18.The second issue was quite a bit more involved. When the techs attempted to remove my old dishwasher on the original install date of October 7, they unhooked the water and drain lines under my kitchen sink. When they couldn’t install the new dishwasher, they did NOT reattach any of those lines. The undersink area flooded, soaked and damaged the wood under the sink. We did not notice it until a couple of days later when the wood was saturated and the water started to flow out onto the kitchen floor. We placed a catch basin under the drip and had to constantly deal with emptying that basin to prevent more damage.  I did not call and report that because I was so fed up and frustrated with the whole process. It took me four weeks to get a contractor to come out and look at the tile in front of the dishwasher and determine what needed to be done to get my old dishwasher out. It cost me $100 for them to tell me that all they had to do to get the old dishwasher out was to RAISE THE LEVELING LEGS, and it came right out.Needless to say, I was very disappointed that your installers apparently didn’t think to try that. So, now that the dishwasher was removed and we were ready for the new dishwasher to be installed, I emailed home install and asked if the new dishwasher could be installed on the same service call as the replacement microwave on November 18. They told me that it would be no problem to amend the work order. When the installer came on November 18 – he installed the new microwave, had me sign that I accepted the delivery and started to leave. I asked about the dishwasher – he was very polite but said he did not have a work order for the dishwasher install. He left – I immediately called install, voiced my displeasure about having to wait for yet another appointment.  I was rescheduled for November 27 to get my dishwasher finally installed.The techs came on November 27 and installed my dishwasher finally.  The tech who installed the second microwave and the dishwasher (Nico) were very nice and did a great job. I have no problems with those 2 teams. The first team was disappointing. We will never buy anything from Electronic Express that has to be delivered and installed.

Review.Titre: I have bought reconditioned items…
Review.Contenu: I have bought reconditioned items before but this one appeared to be a little rough on exterior

Review.Titre: Damaged appliances should always be replaced or take some money off the price.
Review.Contenu: I would of given a 5 star, but! I don't have my paperwork to tell me what my payments are and date of payment.  Also! My microwave was damaged some. My husband and I said it was fine, but! After the delivery guys left. I look at it more and decided I wanted another microwave.  They told me someone would call me and let me know when they could bring me another microwave.  I never received a call back. I have called the warehouse 4 different times. They told me that my microwave was out of stock and they didn't know when more would come in. That wasn't good that they never called me back. Customer are always supposed to come first. I still have a damaged microwave.  At less they should take some off the price of my microwave since they don't want to give me another microwave. I didn't like that I had to keep calling them.

Review.Titre: Unfortunate install issues
Review.Contenu: Our salesperson was pleasant and friendly but a bit talkative lol.  Unfortunately the delivery crew was quite bad, they were not prepared to install and once we pressured them to look at the receipt and call the manager and got them to do the install they did not install correctly and made a very large mess of the house. Our refrigerator was damaged and had to have a follow-up install.

Review.Titre: Appliance arrived quickly.
Review.Contenu: Appliance arrived quickly.Dislikes:Shipping fees are high This item was the same price everywhere else. It’s not discounted.Do better if you expect customers to return.

Review.Titre: The good and the bad
Review.Contenu: Choices and ordering were great, as well as prices. However, I was told my appliances would be here in approximately 2 weeks,  3 weeks at the most. And at 4 weeks, we are still waiting.

Review.Titre: Several issues with appliance
Review.Contenu: Several issues with appliance. Was scratched, had door replaced, would not line up correctly , leaked from freezer front panel, had second door replaced, would not line up and then severe leak from ice/water dispenser.  Had to accept a second scratched refrigerator.  Will not deal with Electronic express in the future.

Review.Titre: Shady pricing tactics
Review.Contenu: Shady sales tactics. Their “before”prices on a lot of stuff are highly inflated to make it seem like the “sale” price is a good deal, but many of the sale prices are just the same price you’d pay anywhere else, but they tell you you’re saving 50% on sale! Do your research, don’t be fooled by their garbage before and after prices.

Review.Titre: Sales- Very Good- Inventory- Very Bad
Review.Contenu: The salesperson was very friendly and sought to understand our needs. The selection was generally reasonable. The reason for the lukewarm review was availability. When I decide to go to a store to buy something versus Amazon, I want to pick it up right then, not two or three days from now. You need more inventory on site.

Review.Titre: Dishwasher is good and quite
Review.Contenu: Dishwasher is good and quite.  Dishwash time seems long but does a good job.  Installation was quite questionable however.  I fixed to leak in the drain line connection myself.  I also removed the two screws the installer was trying to drill into the underside of my granite counter top and used the installation holes provided on each side of the dishwasher to attach it to my cabinets.  This allowed me to level it better as well.  Still glad to have the installers unload it and place and make the original connections and haul-away my old one.

Review.Titre: Delivery was frustrating.
Review.Contenu: Bought a stove, refrigerator, and dishwasher. The first attempt at delivery the crew was uncomfortable trying to put the refrigerator in the house. Understandable so they rescheduled. However, the store manager was extremely rude to my wife and me saying the delivery crew can get the refrigerator in the house. I told him to take it up with them. Second delivery attempt I took off work for and the refrigerator was left off the truck so a third delivery was necessary. An issue with the dishwasher was resolved during the second delivery. Salesman in store was very courteous and attempted to help with the refrigerator and dishwasher issue. All delivery personnel were very professional.

Review.Titre: My washer and dryer were delivered…
Review.Contenu: My washer and dryer were delivered without the pedestals I had purchased. When I called my local store the manager said it was “no big deal” and that I should have them in a couple of weeks.

Review.Titre: Went in to purchase an open box tv
Review.Contenu: Went in to purchase an open box tv. Website said it was there at Springhill TN store. Got there, it wasn’t there. Old bait and switch. Bought the one in box, however I’m very disappointed in Best Buy’s for not giving me the one in the box for the open box price.  Scam!

Review.Titre: The folks who delivered were very good
Review.Contenu: The folks who delivered were very good, this was the first round. They could not hook,the dyer up because they did not have correct cord. I had emphasize the correct size they would need before coming out. So the delivery started from noon to 3, then I was told could be 4 or after took off work, they said didn't no when someone could reschedule for the cord, so here I am washer with no dryer, then since it was a gift from my parents my Dad insisted they fix it quickly and they gave a time for the next day 7 to 10, took off work again, they showed up around 7:45. They did not finish unpacking my dryer and the guys the second day left trash behind for me to throw away. So from here you can figure what was good and what we did not like. Forgot this part when we first called in the woman told us to take that cord back to the store and exchange for the correct cord, we told her they left no cord, and we had paid for delivery and hook up, her comment you can always get a cord.

Review.Titre: Comparable prices
Review.Contenu: I don't believe the majority of the staff even knows what they're talking about.  Hard to distinguish staff from customers.  It's never good for staff to smell strongly of marijuana. Otherwise, prices are comparable to other chain stores.

Review.Titre: I love my new washer and dryer so far but I have to pay over 300 dollars extra out of pockets because incomplete assessment of inlet/outlet.
Review.Contenu: I love my new washer and dryer so far.The people were nice.But I was not asked about the plug-inlet/outlet so they couldn't plug in my dryer therefore I had to pay an electricians to fix it….The delivery people were niceBut After they install the washer my carpet was wet.I first thought that perhaps the old washer leaked on the carpet but I had to keep sopping water for over a week and mold was gathering on the wall behind the washer. (I DID NOT HAVE THIS LEAKING PROBLEM BEFORE the New Washer was installed. It took several more day to get E.E. to come out to found out the problem.The inspectors were nice. They said that It was not the machine.So I had a plumber come out; he charge me 100 dollar to tightening where the holes was put in.I think that the installers should had made sure that it was secured….

Review.Titre: They misrepresents the controller I…
Review.Contenu: They misrepresents the controller I purchased for my son. I think it was Microsoft’s fault too, but I expect the retailer to know what they are selling. The model number on the listing (FST-00008) was not the model number of the controller sent to us (FST-00001). It was a previous version that has a history of bad issues.

Review.Titre: Easy process but damaged products
Review.Contenu: Process was easy, however 1st set I got the dryer didn't dry, had to take and swap out washer and dryer because they didn't have another set like mine. I get new set home and the dryer had a big dent in the side. Luckily they had another set so I only had to take and swap the dryer out. The sales person was great but the manager was rude and seemed like she was spaced out.

Review.Titre: Everything was fine except for the part…
Review.Contenu: Everything was fine except for the part were you have someone following you around like your going to steal something. I understand that they work off commission but 5ft from you the whole time your there is a little extreme

Review.Titre: Very nice high end store
Review.Contenu: The sales boy was not very knowledgeable about anything.  He had good customer service but lacked that personal service knowledge. Had a self guided tour and enjoyed the store greatly.  Love the product!  Klipse 600 home stero surround sound bar

Review.Titre: In store service was great
Review.Contenu: In store service was great. Delivery and setup not so much. Tips expected for basic setups. And I paid over $400 to mount a tv. Seems to be two separate entities between the store and your actual installation and delivery services.

Review.Titre: Great TV
Review.Contenu: Great TV Pleased with the TV after installation and after the family has had viewership for the last few weeks and it looks like it will hold up well. The problem was poor packaging during their delivery which was deposited on my doorstep stealthily!

Review.Titre: It took three times before I got the…
Review.Contenu: It took three times before I got the right refrigerator.  Everyone was nice but I wasted several days waiting around for each delivery attempt.  So far, the refrigerator still works well.

Review.Titre: The delivery was not so good
Review.Contenu: The delivery was not so good. They tore my door frame up pretty bad. The salesman was great. Y’all definitely need to figure out a better way for delivery.

Review.Titre: What ever happened to the customer is first?
Review.Contenu: G. M. Hunter is top shelf in his dealing with this customer. When I went into the store, I told him I was not real happy with E.E. at present. He listened to my complaints and understood the situation. I had spent most of the day trying to get E. E. phone sales. Something other stores do but not E.E. Overall my time with Hunter was productive and friendly. Can't say the same for most E. E. floor or 'net people I dealt with.

Review.Titre: I disliked the fact that my…
Review.Contenu: I disliked the fact that my refrigerator on the first delivery was damaged. I had to wait another week to received a brand new one. The second delivery was somewhat disappointing because I had to leave my new refrigerator out on my back deck for a for days and was not able to get things hooked up or my old refrigerator disposed of. This was all due to the issue with me not having a shut off valve on the waterline running into the back of my old refrigerator. No blame but I had been without a proper working refrigerator for a few years now. I had my mind focused on a new up to date refrigerator of my choice. I think if you had someone that was more advanced with the installment process you would not have to turn the customer away because the delivery guy doesn't know how to install shut off valves. It's all a part of successfully installing refrigerators. There were a few bleeps with my delivery but accidents do happen. All in all I would still recommend purchasing electronic or appliances from Electronic Express. I plan to purchase items from Electronic Express in the near future. Thanks M and K Thomas

Review.Titre: I feel like when tell the sales person…
Review.Contenu: I feel like when tell the sales person that you are not interested in all the extras they try to push on you, that they should stop after the first time you tell them NO instead of keep asking you to buy this or that.

Review.Titre: I had to replace a defective microwave
Review.Contenu: I had to replace a defective microwave; had to go to the warehouse to retrieve -they insisted I could not bring the broken one back to the warehouse (even though that is the same address on the shipping label they sent) customer service was completely rude and could not explain why if I had to drive 40 miles to pick the new one up why I could not drop off the broken one.

Review.Titre: LG mount
Review.Contenu: I reached out to Electronic Express for lead time before placing my order and was told I would have my order in 3-5 days....it took 12!  I was in a time crunch.  After 5 days, i asked where my order was and I received an "We're sorry for the delay.  You can cancel if you would like."  When I would ask for an ETA they would give a broad..."it'll ship this week"It is unprofessional of them to not even provide and accurate ETA.  It seemed like they didn't care.  I finally received it and the product is fine but I don't think I will be ordering from them again.

Review.Titre: Return Policy Fail
Review.Contenu: Ordered a Computer Monitor.  Arrived as expected. Installed.Worked fine for 2 days.  Day 3 screen would go to black thencome back on.  Day 4 monitor died.  I thought no big deal, take to a retailstore give them the dead monitor they give me one that works ... Advised by CS No returns to storeShip back to company - they will evaluate and issue a refundI should have ordered from Amazon

Review.Titre: Got a good deal, but not perfect
Review.Contenu: Very good deal and was shipped on time.  But I would have liked the watch to be packed a little more safely for shipping. The watch box was just put directly into a mailer with no cushioning.  I also noticed a very light hairline scratch on the bezel.  It's not noticeable so I'm keeping it, but again not ideal.

Review.Titre: A bit disappointed in the shipping…
Review.Contenu: A bit disappointed in the shipping time. Still haven't received it.

Review.Titre: Chrome book
Review.Contenu: I wish the salesman had told me that iTunes doesn't work on chrome book. Other than that, it was a good experience.

Review.Titre: We just moved to Gallatin from…
Review.Contenu: We just moved to Gallatin from Scottsdale AZ.  My son-in-law bought his Samsung 75" TV from your store so I went and bought 2 of the same for our new home in Gallatin.  Everyone was nice, the their ENTHUSIASM was low.  I told them from the start I knew exactly what I wanted and showed them the exact model and asked them NOT TO TRY TO SELL ME ANYTHING ELSE.  That did no good.They seemed all 4 or 5 of the employees, not to want to leave the cash register area and walk down to the TV's and then wanted to discuss other model.  I did not appreciate it, and reminded him NOT to make any suggestions.I told him I had 21 Samsung TV's in my last home and I loved them and have no interest in buying anything other than the model I showed him on my iPhone.  He back off and went to work.I wanted them delivered AS SOON AS POSSIBLE.  And also wanted them installed if they had a day in the next few days, and if not my son-in-law would do it.  I didn't want him to have to as he is very busy. I reiterated whether or not they could install them I WANTED THEM DELIVERED AS SOON AS POSSIBLE.  It seemed to go in one ear and out the other.Now regarding the delivery.  I did get the TV's the following day.  The delivery guys came from North Carolina I believe he told me.  THEY WERE GREAT.  One of the guys carried a TV by himself (super strong) and handled himself and the other man was also a very good worker.  THEY DID A GREAT JOB.Back to the store associates for a moment.  I did witness a couple other customers come in.  One wanted a refund and another something else.  The team seemed to handle them fine.  That was nice.  They were very nice to me, JUST POOR LISTENERS.I would consider doing business with you again in the future, even though all of my electronics have come from BEST BUY.  I do appreciate convenience and your store in Gallatin is only a mile or two from me.One more thing.  Your questions below are crazy.  Why would you ask me which store.  You know the answer better than I do???Why would you ask me my name.  You also know that???More of a waste of my time and making me read a list of stores to click on.  Give your quiz some serious thought and learn from me only things you don't already know.

Review.Titre: okay
Review.Contenu: Salesman told me my equipment would not work if I did not buy what he suggested

Review.Titre: Put the year and generation of product on website.
Review.Contenu: Your site is misleading I got a 2018 iPad Pro instead of a 2020 .  You should really make that clear on your site . It’s not good business robbery deceptive.

Review.Titre: The salesman that waited on us did not…
Review.Contenu: The salesman that waited on us did not know anything about the wi-fi extender device.

Review.Titre: Long LT
Review.Contenu: I waited 5 days to get a shipping confirmation, which required a phone call to get.

Review.Titre: Room for improvement
Review.Contenu: Made my order. They excepted. They charged me for the product. They emailed me the next day and said that it was out of stock.When you have a product out of stock please make it impossible for people to order it.

Review.Titre: The manager and a salesman openly…
Review.Contenu: The manager and a salesman openly disagreed about the product I should buy on the sales floor.

Review.Titre: Try to up sell things you do not need
Low inventory
Review.Contenu: Not enough inventory on hand. Advertised item not availabe in store

Review.Titre: Salesman was knowledgeable but had…
Review.Contenu: Salesman was knowledgeable but had really bad breath.

Review.Titre: Could have been more available sooner…
Review.Contenu: Could have been more available sooner for questions

Review.Titre: Poorly packaged for shipping.
Review.Contenu: The of my items was good, but they bag it was shipped in caused some damage to the box. Wasn’t happy about that.

Review.Titre: Had to return my first order ever
Review.Contenu: Had to return my first order ever. Sad but they took care of it.

Review.Titre: First trip second trip
Review.Contenu: Not sure of the exact dates buy may of 23 I went in to the store here in my town to look for speakers as I stood in the speaker display trying to figure it all out there was Noone around except three employees sitting in the next section over when I would loo thier way they wood turn around  so I left a few days later I had to go back it seems they were the only place I could the speakers I wanted an this time there a very nice young man I can't remember his name but he was very helpful I'd go back only if he was working

Review.Titre: Still havent gotten my stove been 9…
Review.Contenu: Still havent gotten my stove been 9 weeks

Review.Titre: Sales person was rude and obnoxious.
Good packaging the helmet was a little…
Review.Contenu: Good packaging the helmet was a little scratch

Review.Titre: Had to return first TV
Review.Contenu: Had to return first TV, due to half the screen was dark.

Review.Titre: Appliance install BEWARE
Review.Contenu: Two appliance install experiences. 1. Dishwasher was not sold with a cord to hardwire so the install could not be completed that day. 2. Range was delivered and I was informed they no longer install gas appliances and would only take my old one of it was unhooked. The salesman sold me a gas kit so that it could be installed by EE. I then had the range sitting in my living room in a box.

Review.Titre: Everything was great
Review.Contenu: Everything was great! Shipping was fast, and the product arrived as described. However, it went in sale for $80 less not even a week after it was delivered, and I contacted you guys asking if it would be possible to match the new sale price. I was told no, and it’s unfortunate because the original transaction was so close to the new sale price. A store credit would have even been great.

Review.Titre: Extremely difficult to be able reach a…
Review.Contenu: Extremely difficult to be able reach a person...called multiple times and several days to finally reach a person. I had received a defective new cd player and wanted help to return it. Thinking about placing another order but concerned I might have the same experience. It has been over 2 weeks since I returned the product and I have not received a confirmation credit of my returned item.

Review.Titre: This has been my first experience with…
Review.Contenu: This has been my first experience with this company and I'm disappointed. I ordered an in stock monitor and 9 days later it has still not shipped and customer service is very slow at relying to any emails. The price was good on the monitor but making a shipping label the day I bought it and 9 days later it still has not shipped is very troubling for me

Review.Titre: Shipping Method is Seriously Lacking
Review.Contenu: The purchase experience was fine, but the item was shipped in the worst packaging ever. An almost $200 Nintendo 2 DS XL was put into nothing more than a padded envelope. They charged $15 for shipping, and that's the best packaging they could find? By the time it got to me there were multiple tears in the envelope and part of the seal had been torn open. Thankfully, the device worked, but for $15 I expected a little better packaging.

Review.Titre: I hate it when a salesman bs me
Review.Contenu: I hate it when a salesman bs me. Its what happened here. Guy in the store talked me into getting this expensive gaming monitor, "because thats the kind he uses." Found a better deal online at EE website and had to return the one I bought in person. He could have probably searched online on their website the first time and saved me the trouble.

Review.Titre: they shipped everything
Review.Contenu: they shipped everything well nothing was broken but it was defective and had to send it back. they wouldnt send me any return info for fedex to come and pick it up, so i have no proof whatsoever so i had to make the fedex guy leave. i called them again and finally  got info about the return so the fedex will come again today, hopefully. will update

Review.Titre: The TV shipped quickly but was used
Review.Contenu: The TV shipped quickly at a good price. However, it was supposed to be a new tv, and it had been used. The packaging inside was disturbed, and the roku had already been set up with a person's account. It appeared that it may have been a display model. It worked fine, but when you buy a new tv, you don't want one that has been used.

Review.Titre: I wanted to rate this 5 out of 5 but…
Review.Contenu: I wanted to rate this 5 out of 5 but based on the issues I am having with the products and then having to go through the manufacturer for help (products are out of warranty). So now I have no way of getting this resolved and stuck with my order. Great ordering process and would recommend to others but just be careful with making sure your products work properly.

Review.Titre: Shipping delayed
Review.Contenu: My AC was initially going to come in a few days but got inexplicably delayed so it came the day after a heat wave ended. We got a shipping confirmation notice and then it didn't actually get dropped off at the shipping company for almost a week. Customer service was very responsive but could not offer any explanation for the delayed shipping. AC works great.

Review.Titre: Good product but experience buying it
Review.Contenu: I bought a beautiful Cookware, the product was great but for some reason they charged my card twice and sent to my email  only one receipt showing one transaction.  Thanks God I checked my account around two days after the purchased then I  saw the double transaction. I called customer service they handled properly but it wasn't such a good experience.

Review.Titre: Listed as damaged box but had more damage than the box.
Review.Contenu: I purchased a vacuum, arrived a few days late. It was listed as having a damaged box. After opening the canister was damaged and the power switch was inoperable. I notified and was sent a shipping label. Not happy that the vacuum was not inspected before being shipped and the time lost dealing with it but the seller probably does not look inside a box before shipping and they did refund me.

Review.Titre: Buying w Electronic Express online was…
Review.Contenu: Buying w Electronic Express online was great. Free Fedex shipping sucked. Fedex had my package out for delivery on Friday. Fedex said my address did not exist on friday. I did not receive it until the following Tuesday. Funny how my address did not exist one day and they could deliver later. Although the package looked like it had been through hell, the inside was OK.If I buy from Electronic Express again, I will insist on UPS or USPS shipping. They can find me!!!!!

Review.Titre: Jaded customer service
Review.Contenu: My package was stolen upon delivery, while this is not Electronic Express' fault, when I called in to ask what I could do next I was simply told "we are not liable, sorry." No next steps, coupons, what I should do, nothing etc. Had a police report and everything. Again, not their fault but it clearly shows much they value a customer who may have otherwise returned. Particularly when I went out of the way to support a small business...Every big box store had the same price, and would have likely refunded me.

Review.Titre: Electronic Express Credit Card
Review.Contenu: I love Electronic Express the sales and prices aren't bad, butwhen it comes to using their credit card that's a different story.How do you have a credit card but cannot use it on their website,you can use other cards even Amazon pay but cannot use the cardof the website Electronic Express, I sometimes don't want to go tothe store and the nearest store to me is 45 minutes.

Review.Titre: The store was nice but the service…
Review.Contenu: The store was nice but the service needs work. i was looking for surround sound and blueray player, kid comes to help after i found it says he is going to look in the back for it i also inform him i was looking for a sub woofer for a car and i would be there when he returned he says ok and goes to help someone else for 20min. then comes to help me. get a sub down off a shelf. just not the service I would expect.

Review.Titre: Overpriced
Review.Contenu: Kind of overpriced shipping is 24$. Not to mention there is no return label you have to pay for that as well. This seems as if that’s a disaster waiting to happen if you don’t get insurance when you return something. Just not the most cost efficient on their shipping and returns. Will not use their service again.

Review.Titre: Good ... and Bad
Review.Contenu: Good ... and bad....Great prices.... easy to find.... Fast shipping BUTI didn’t even know I bought my item until it arrived at my door!   Went through the process...I put my paypal info...and waited and waited and waited... Payment never accepted. Never confirmed. Tried 3 times and gave up.   So I ordered from somewhere else... and ended up with two PS4 gaming systems!  Fortunately was able to unload the second one without a problem....but what if I hadn’t?

Review.Titre: I visited The 100 Oaks Store looking…
Review.Contenu: I visited The 100 Oaks Store looking for an air condition by Danby it was not in stock, the associate checked the warehouse on the computer the price was 319.00 when the cashier rang it up the price jumped to 429.99   with a 30 per cent discount the subtotal price was 299.99. It appears it was a mark up to mark down.

Review.Titre: DVD player poorly packaged
Review.Contenu: DVD player arrived in original manufacturers box stuffed inside a plastic non padded envelope!  Every other electronic device I've ordered online in the past comes double boxed with padding between the boxes. This helps protect the inner box from the gorillas handling boxes in transit!Fortunately the DVD player works but I'm sure it got more shocks in transit than it needed.

Review.Titre: When .i came like 2 weeks ago jyst relocated here with GM
Review.Contenu: When .. I walked into the store the male Caucasian young man wouldn’t service me . He went & got this other young lady who did .. she showed me items .. I wanted & serviced me . He stood around & only serviced the white men who came in after me. I spent almost 1,800 ...I should of not given you my money ..The young lady was very nice .. I wanted to tip her .

Review.Titre: Was a bit of a delayed process in…
Review.Contenu: Was a bit of a delayed process in getting the product I ordered but it did arrive after about 25 days. Customer service didn't tell me anything about my delayed / damaged goods and I had to contact them multiple times to get updates on my order. Good prices but there may be a wait for your product.

Review.Titre: Simple request ignored.
Review.Contenu: Especially since EE was using USPS for delivery, I requested that my package be sent to my Post Office box address. I live on a busy street and do not like unsecured deliveries when I can avoid that. That simple request was ignored. Thankfully I did receive the package albeit it had sat in the rain several hours. Happily, the item survived that.

Review.Titre: It was ok
Review.Contenu: I purchased a tv through the Acceptance Now financier & It was ok. The 90 day same as cash definitely has hidden fees that no one told me about. As I neared the end of my agreement, I went in and inquired about purchasing something else and was questioned about who my landlord was and that my mom would have to come sign. I was in shock because I’m over 25 and had made every payment on time. Didn’t know what that had to do with anything.

Review.Titre: Overpriced, long install time
Review.Contenu: Bought stereo that ultimately didn't work with my phone. Cannot take advantage of features without upgrading my already new phone. They charged way too much to install (triple what the place down the street quoted me). Was quoted a 1.5 hour wait. It took them 3.5 hours to install....Won't be revisiting this overpriced shop anytime soon...

Review.Titre: The package I received was beat up and…
Review.Contenu: The package I received was beat up and torn. Don't know if it was the shipper or came from the warehouse in bad shape. When the package was opened, the product was damaged. I will give Electronic Express credit, when I reported the damage they immediately issued a return authorization.

Review.Titre: Great site, unusual shipping problems, but solved eventually
Review.Contenu: Great site, great prices, great communication.  I give it three stars because of snafus in shipping, not due to the shipper (FedEx), but Electronic Express' warehouse mishandling.  I eventually  received my product, but not without a lot of follow-up, phone calls and emails. I have to say I have never had a problem with orders; to be fair, this is an extremely rare shipping scenario.Appropriate apology was made and accepted. I will continue to be a customer; EE is a wonderful site with amazing deals.MIke W.

Review.Titre: The item ordered was not available
Review.Contenu: The item ordered was not available but no one told us until I called because the receipt had not been e-mailed.  We were told we would receive a phone call the day before installation to give us a time frame.  By 6:00 we had not received a call so I called the store.  Instead of a phone call we got a text message.  Instead of a phone call 30 minutes before delivery we got a text message.  The home phone number is the one given to the sales person, but it wasn't used.

Review.Titre: Express Electronics has an excellent price on Samsung Flex washer  & dryer
Review.Contenu: Express Electronics has an excellent deal on the Samsung Flex washer and dryer bundle. The only two things that made this experience a little sour was the change in a shipping company, which led to additional days in receiving my purchase. My second issue was about the promotional period.

Review.Titre: Well I guess the price was too good to…
Review.Contenu: Well I guess the price was too good to be true? But my granddaughter loves the iPad. However, when trying to find a case to fit it, we realized that it is a 2012 model and we cannot find a case for one that old. I realize I bought a reconditioned item. I just didn’t realize how old it actually was.

Review.Titre: I am giving 3 stars because they…
Review.Contenu: I am giving 3 stars because they replied quick to the return and refund.  For some reason, unknown, the battery they sent me was the exact same markings and model as the battery that I have but their battery would not fit into the phone.  just a fraction of an inch bigger on their battery.  I am in search for another battery.

Review.Titre: Disappointed
Review.Contenu: Disappointed ! I ordered the TV and the website said it was in stock ,A couple of days later when checking shipping status the Company said it was back ordered  I called the Company and complained. Finally I got a person to help but the TV was finally shipped. No sure if I will order from the company again

Review.Titre: The rating would have been higher but…
Review.Contenu: The rating would have been higher but they waited 1 week before shipping my product and did not let me know why. They did let me know when it was shipped and tracking information. Product was received as ordered. All in all it was a good experience.though. This is  my first time buying from them.

Review.Titre: Our purchasing process was good...but...
Review.Contenu: Our purchasing process was good.  Our salesperson was knowledgeable and helpful.  He told us we would receive a call in about a week and a half to let us know when our dishwasher was in so we could pick it up.  When we hadn't received a call, we called them only to be told that the dishwasher wasn't on the most recent truck and so would not be in for another week.  Three weeks to get a dishwasher into the store after purchase.  Still hand washing dishes...I know, I know.  Still, 3 weeks????  Really?

Review.Titre: Tablet was sent to my address in…
Review.Contenu: Tablet was sent to my address in Tennessee. Not my Moms in NJ. Kind of a bummer. I put in the right address. Not to mention having to use my bank account, not my charge account. It was denied. No balance, offers begging me to use it. Met everyone next time. My other purchases went elsewhere.

Review.Titre: …Where is the service?
Review.Contenu: My rating has been formed from experiences at more than one store outlet. My initial ratings would have been all 5 star ratings. Store on Nolensville Rd. in  Nashville,Tn. Most of my other experiences have come from visits to the Rivergate outlet in Madison, Tn. There are never enough "associates" at the Rivergate outlet,.... and I've waited over twenty minutes to get some service there. Most times,... I simply walk out. I have purchased 4 televisions from the Nolensville Rd. store,.. and only a phone cord, or two, from the rivergate store.

Review.Titre: Order was placed but never confirmed..
Review.Contenu: Order was placed but never confirmed... next thing I knew about a week later I received email telling me product shipped.  Since it was shipped only in its original box, just places in a shipping bag, the box and product was slightly damaged. It works fine just a minor dent.

Review.Titre: Took too long to get my TV so I bought…
Review.Contenu: Took too long to get my TV so I bought it from another store. Communications from EE was way too inconsistent and slow, I always had to reach out for status. After waiting almost 3 weeks for a $3400 purchase, I cancelled it and bought the TV for the same price from a store and brought it home myself.

Review.Titre: Car Stereo Expereince could have been better.
Review.Contenu: Great immediate assistance with car stereo equipment purchasing decision.  Installation experience was not as smooth.  Installer did not install camera with a connection that would allow activation with a  button on the radio. The installer seemed annoyed that I was questioning his method of installation.  Management was engaged to resolve and I had to return two times to have this ultimately corrected.  I also showed management some minor damage to my dash from the installation, but was not offered any concession.

Review.Titre: TV ads promote 4K
Review.Contenu: TV ads promote 4K, 8K, Qled, Oled and programs or networks or cable providers show little or nothing with that resolution! It is a rip off and I fell prey to their plan! Don’t pay for expensive TV like you see in the stores only to get home and see just cheap TV resolution! Rip off! Glynn Jackson

Review.Titre: thompson neo10 notebook
Review.Contenu: while the shipping speed was fine, i cant say much for the computer software, i found it to be rather limited. i use google alot but learn this computer doesnt offer it. also it seems to take forever to load. not my first choice of a computer, i prefer dell. but the price is reasonable.

Review.Titre: Proper price point and fast delivery
Review.Contenu: Proper price point and fast delivery. But you lost 1 star for another item listed for $100 more than everyday shelf price at Walmart. Kitchen aide mixer listed at $349 which has been $249 for over a year there.

Review.Titre: Ms Pac-Man
Review.Contenu: If a full size arcade is what you after with an affordable price, then come here.My only reason for losing a star is delivery time.  I will definitely shop here again and already recommended it to two of my friends. I am harsh critic. So to recommend to someone else is my greatest compliment

Review.Titre: Hello
Review.Contenu: Hello, I ordered the meta quest 3 for my sonnfornhis birthday. One of the remotes would not work. I returned it and im awaiting for the refund to clear, then I'm going to try to order another one and hope this one is better. The customer service was great in assisting me for the refund process.

Review.Contenu: The company is great and shipped my purchase fast but lose 1 star because I found a better price on the same item a few days later and they refused to honor it.

Review.Titre: A Solid Shopping Experience
Review.Contenu: E.E. offers easy and uncomplicated online shopping, although I do find their website a bit outdated and unintuitive when compared to larger national competitors. The delivery was on time and the driver was very courteous and helpful, but he really could have used a second set of hands on the truck in delivering such a large and heavy item. I assisted the driver in getting the item from the driveway into the house, but a retiree/elderly person's experience would have been quite different.The bottom line: I will always appreciate being able to order the exact item that I want from a local/regionally based business vs. Amazon, Best Buy, Lowe's/Home Depot, etc. I am very happy that we have Electronic Express here in the Nashville area.

Review.Titre: Was quick and easy
Review.Contenu: Was quick and easy. Only problem is shipping information and traceability. I reached out a couple of times to find out where my item was. Still haven't received it yet so can't say you guys are the best. Est. Delivery date Dec. 7th, it is the 8th today so as soon as I receive my items I can give 5 stars if everything is in order

Review.Titre: I ordered the washer and dryer before I…
Review.Contenu: I ordered the washer and dryer before I realized the dryer door needed to be opened in the down position only frantically I tried calling it was Sunday I ordered them online so I went to the chat feature and explain my situation I received a reply that they can't change my order once it's in the pipe they can cancel it and then I can reorder and true to their word they did exactly that canceled my order and refunded my money I used Amazon pay and they're credited back to that Institution

Review.Titre: Good Customer Service
Review.Contenu: Sales Person was knowledgable and helpful.  Our refigerator quit working and they could delive new one in 3 days which was fastest of 3 places that I went to purchase one.  The two men that delivered the Refrigerator were exceptional and very careful in taking the old one out (removing all handles on it) and taking front door off the hinges to avoid scraching it.  They were very careful bringing new one in and setting it up.

Review.Titre: Great sales expertise
Review.Contenu: Robert, the salesperson at EE did a great job helping me to decide which washer/dryer was best for meeting our needs. He took me through the purchasing process and made sure I had the warranty protection I needed. He also gave me rebate info that would refund me $100.

Review.Titre: Great selection and prompt shipping for online orders
Review.Contenu: My online order was shipped promptly and the ordering process was easy.  Giving 4 stars instead of 5 since I would have liked the option to have expedited shipping at additional cost.

Review.Titre: Dishwasher
Review.Contenu: Employees at Electronic Express were helpful and friendly. Had to call installers back and the one that answered the home was also helpful and friendly,The installers were friendly as well.

Review.Titre: The people were very friendly and…
Review.Contenu: The people were very friendly and helpful. They made sure I had everything I needed and that my payments were affordable. They keep their store clean and neat including the restroom

Review.Titre: Needed a fitness tracker watch asap
Review.Contenu: My Charge 5 Fitbit died and I wanted to replace it. They are apparently backordered or out of stock everywhere and I needed one asap. Electronic Express had it, even though not my preferred color, so I ordered it.  It took about 5 days to arrive in PA, which is the reason for 4 stars instead of 5, but no complaints otherwise. I just hope this Fitbit lasts longer than the previous ones.

Review.Titre: Good except for shipping
Review.Contenu: First purchase at this site.  Overall it was a good experience, however I had issues with the shipping. I use a PO box for all my mail and packages. If PO box shipping is not allowed, a website will usually prevent the transaction.  This one did not. My package was shipped quickly but was held at my area UPS distribution center for days.  I kept checking the tracking, but it never moved.  There was no notification from UPS nor this retailer.  I finally contacted UPS and learned that my package couldn't go to my PO box, and I must make the 1 hour round trip to pick it up within the next 3 days.  This site should alert buyers to delivery options/problems.

Review.Titre: Helpful Employee
Review.Contenu: Someone offered to help as soon as I entered the store.  But not in an aggressive way, in a helpful way.  The store employee was able to answer any questions I had.  When I asked to walk throughout the store to take a look at everything they offered, he left me alone and allowed me to take my time.

Review.Titre: Zach is a great guy goes above and…
Review.Contenu: Zach is a great guy goes above and beyond. We purchased a display item from him and received the wrong remote. Called and  spoke with him the following day about it. He not only had found the correct remote he also synced everything.

Review.Titre: Would buy here again
Review.Contenu: Good service, lots of product to look at in-store, and knowledgeable sales people. Follow up after the delivery and install was excellent. The only reason this isn’t five stars was that I was unable to get the refrigerator for five days. That was their earliest option for any in-stock item. If that had been 2-3 days, this would be 5 stars.

Review.Titre: Store was small but well stocked
Review.Contenu: Store was small but well stocked. The staff was engaged in a lively conversation with a customer when I arrived, but eventually one of the staff broke away from the conversation to help me find a TV. Told me it could connect wirelessly to my home WiFi and connect to Xfinity; it did quickly connect to WiFi but I was never able to get a wireless connection to my Xfinity account (had to use HDMI cable). This was due to my lack of knowledge in how to accomplish, but the salesman did not give me sufficient guidance. He did take the TV to the car and loaded it for me, which was appreciated. I will probably shop there again...

Review.Titre: Shipping box was a little smashed
Review.Contenu: Shipping box was a little smashed, cant say this wasn't USPS fault or not but there was packing material on the inside and my items were not damaged. Everything else in dealing with this company was top notch though.

Review.Titre: Product OK
Review.Contenu: Product OK.  Sales person great.   Need at least a few grocery type carts for people with disabilities to push and lean on while shopping.  Preferably. one or two electric handicap carts to use over the large floor space.   I personally cannot walk much and need a cart.  I have bought there a time or two but cannot manage walking to see any of your products.

Review.Titre: The item took a little more time than I…
Review.Contenu: The item took a little more time than I expected.

Review.Titre: Great Washer, but felt a little misled.
Review.Contenu: I love my Speed Queen washer. The buying experience was excellent, except for one small issue. I bought from their Scratch & Dent store, & was told "my washer had been refused on delivery b/c it was dented". It turns out that wasn't the case. It had been a return during the 30 day return period, b/c the former customer had already registered the Serial #. I had to call SQ to get the Warranty switched over into my name. Not a deal breaker, as it was a good deal. However, it would have been nice to know the truth initially.

Review.Titre: great customer service at the…
Review.Contenu: great customer service at the store......delivery of stove and hook up of stove went well. delivery of laundry center (stacked washer dryer one unit) was great it had to be put in garage as we needed plumbing & electrical work done before install. Unit was not working, called for replacement, delivery center gave us run around, called store and they okayed new unit, delivery center still gave us run around we are currently waiting for new unit to be delivered tomorrow.

After I placed my order & received one board, I was disappointed when EE informed me that the other size was out of stock (I think it was discontinued). However, I am glad to have the 1 board. It arrived quickly, in good condition.

Review.Titre: Great service and payment plans. Need better TV displays
Review.Contenu: We are returning customers.  We've been happy with all our purchases. My one complaint is the TV screens do not show the same background.  For example, I was deciding between an oled and qled. The tvs were not near each other and did not display the same background.  Potential customers need to see live TV Shows on the tvs. The display is deceiving. Most people do not watch in motion. TV color is different.   The oled seemed brighter. I told my husband why but he wanted the samsung oled.

We have purchased many things from Electronics Express in Oak Ridge over the past 5 years. We have been very pleased with all our purchases.

Once I was able to locate someone (I believe the manager), he was honest, professional, and very knowledgeable of the product(s) I was looking at. The system I ended up purchasing worked exactly as the salesman said it would and I couldn't be happier with the purchase.

Review.Titre: First time purchasing

The only reason for the 4 star rating was due to the delivery personnel not contacting me the day prior giving me an appropriate time of delivery and lack of notification 30 minutes prior to arrival. It all worked itself out but the company needs to be aware that processes and procedures were not followed in this area. At any rate, I am sold on Electronic Express and will return for future needs.

Review.Titre: Awesome customer service!
Review.Contenu: I purchased a 65” Bravia tv from Amazon by way of Walt’s tv, big mistake! Tv came to the house cracked, Amazon said I needed to go through Walt’s for replacement or refund, Walt’s said I had to take the boxed up tv to FedEx drop off? I guess to dollar general??? Anyways I called FedEx and they came and picked up! It took 2 weeks for them to get it and credit back my financing! Meantime I went to electronic express website and ordered another one, it was $100 dollars more, but the other one was on sale for prime days, it came in a couple days in perfect condition! I love this tv and electronic express because, I called customer service within the 30 days to buy the warranty and they told me it was on sale for $200 less, so warranty was $100 less and, and, and they credited my financing $200 within minutes of the end of our call!!
